hierophant:PietyPower.NAME: Piety
DESCRIPTIONS: Defeat enemies with HP equal or lower than #b
at the end of your turn. Lose #b2 Piety when dealing unblocked attack damage.

hierophant:AuricFormPower.NAME: Auric Form
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, lose #b,
% of your Gold, then gain that much block.

hierophant:RarePower.NAME: Placeholder Power
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, TOUCH #b
